name: RoboHunter (ChloriDeV)
description:
There are 14 levels in this game. The demo version of RoboHunter is free (the first 5 levels). You can buy the full version of the game (14 levels in total) for $1.

    In this shooting game, you control a combat jet robot, your goal is to destroy all enemies.  

    The game has 2 types of ground enemies, 1 type of flying enemy and 3 bosses. You can move both on the ground and fly. You can use 4 types of camera view.

    Some tips and hints:

        -  You have 5 lives (L.) to return to the lost level. When you exit the game, the number of lives and the number of the current level are saved;

        -  To replenish health, fuel or bullets, find the appropriate boxes;

        -  Use the ability to switch cameras depending on the situation for convenience;

        -  To move to the next level, you need to destroy all the enemies at the current level. If it seems to you that you have completed a level, but no new enemies appear, look more carefully for the remaining enemies;

        -  Pay attention that in flight mode fuel is spent even when you are standing on the ground;

        -  If the shooting angle has become uncomfortable, pull the mouse up or down;

        -  Make more moves to make it harder for enemies to hit you;

        -  Try not to waste bullets and fuel in vain.

    Control keys:

        WASD - moving

        Q - enable flight mode

        E - disable flight mode

        Space- jump / fly

        Mouse - rotation

        RMB -    switch camera

        LMB - shot

        MMB - rear view

        R - laser sight  

        U - mute / unmute

        N - new game

        P - pause / info

        H - help

        Window key - reduce the game window to exit the game
